item.title: Evofarm
item.description:
Evolufarm is a farming game started on Friday 1st December 2017.

Your grandfather died few days ago, he left you a farm and debts as an inheritance.

You have work and sold recolts to repay debts.

Get plants, get tools, get machines.

Evolve your plants, upgrade your tools, upgrade your machines.

Hello everyone and welcome!

I'm Ensikyo, an independent developer and I'm interested in making apps and video games.

These are the reasons why I created this website:

  • chevron_right Sharing my projects with you, because I think sharing is the key to success. This website and social media allow you to share your opinion, your feedback and your support. Thanks to you I can evolve, I can progress and make better games for you.


  • chevron_right Writing things down. It's a good way to organize and plan my work.


  • chevron_right Keeping motivation by keeping track of things already done and by keeping a pace. Each week, I will write an article about games in development showing you the progress and asking your opinions about next changes.

I hope we will make great things together.

Thanks for reading.

item.title: About
item.description:
About

Leave your mark in my projects

On this website you can leave your mark in games I’m currently making and give feedback on my completed projects, propose improvements, ideas and give your opinion about game design

During development processes, I will regularly ask you via polls your preferences between several options or let you express yourself about. If you don’t want to participate: no problem. I understand people who simply want to see the progress of projects they are interested in and update logs.

Who am I ?

I’m Ensikyo, an independent french developer. I like making apps and games. I like programming for the creative abilities it grants. I’m not good at drawing, that’s why my first games will have simple graphics but I’m practicing and I’m making progress. Feel free to ask any question you have.

sentiment_very_satisfied Click to say hello sentiment_very_satisfied

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Contact

Do you want to share an idea? Give feedback? Are you encountering a bug or an issue? Have you a business proposal? Do you want to say hello?

You can use the form below or contact me on social media.

item.title: Support
item.description:
Support

The most efficient way to help me is by participating and by sharing articles and projects you like. If you know people interested in video games, please do share.

I also accept any voluntary help: especially translations and graphical improvements.

I hope together we can make great games we both enjoy !

Thank you for your support. ❤
